projects.title: Tourism Database Management
projects.bodyText:
- Designed database system using MySQL to manage tourist details considering tourists' preferences regarding locations, prices and mode of transport.
 - Implemented table level constraints, validated bookings, and performed data encryption to encrypt passwords and payment methods. 
  - Added computed columns to tables to check the number of days of travel costs. 
  - Analysed usersâ€™ past booking data, including locations visited, using python and drawing conclusions to users travel destinations and hidden gems of locations.

projects.title: Amazon Review Sentiment Analysis
projects.bodyText:
- Collected data from Amazon and conducted comprehensive pre-processing, including data cleaning, transformation, wrangling, and reduction using Python and Pandas. 
 - Performed exploratory data analysis and visualization using Matplotlib and Seaborn to detect and rectify data inconsistencies prior to machine learning sentiment analysis. 
 - Implemented machine learning models including Naive Bayes, Logistic Regression, and LSTM (Long Short Term Memory) using Scikit-learn and Keras, finding that LSTM achieved the highest accuracy of over 80%. ,

projects.title: Housing Portfolio Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Acquired housing data and performed pre-processing including data cleaning, data transformation, data wrangling, and data reduction.
 - Identified, analysed, and interpreted trends and patterns in complex data set.
 - Analysed data using statistical methods and provided reports.
